name: Tiny Lander
description:
Tiny Lander is a game about a spaceship. You must find the coins and reach the end platform.

Changelog:

27/02/2017 - Updated camera death effect, added a new level.

28/02/2017 - Added a new easy level, tweaks in background colors.

29/02/2017 - Added a maze level generator.

01/03/2017 - Controller vibration support, full controller support.

02/03/2017 - Android port.
